navbar.supportDescription: Help sustain development, keep it free, and grow features!

home.description: Dive into a comprehensive guide showcasing Next.js capabilities. Learn and implement cutting-edge features to elevate your development skills.

about.title: About Our Mission
about.description: Our goal is to create a comprehensive learning resource by showcasing Next.js features. Join us in exploring the future of web development.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.description: Use a permanent address where you can receive mail.

role.title: Your Role
role.description: Your current access level in the system

bio.label: Bio
bio.placeholder: Tell us a bit about yourself

exportData.title: Export Your Account Data
exportData.description: Want a backup of your account details? Download all the information linked to your account, including personal settings, purchase history, and saved preferences, in just a few clicks.
exportData.details: This download includes essential data, such as your account settings, preferences, and transaction history. For security, ensure that you store the file in a safe location to protect your information.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Your Account
deleteAccount.description: Deleting your account will permanently remove all your personal data, preferences, and purchase history. Please make sure you really want to proceed.
deleteAccount.warning: Once your account is deleted, it cannot be undone. Ensure you have a backup of any important data before proceeding.

modal.title: Confirm Account Deletion
modal.description: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
